glossary.title: Abbreviations
glossary.p: ATCC: American Type Culture Collection; CFU, colony forming units; DPPH, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl; ED 50, median effective dose; EI, electron impact; FRAP, ferric reducing antioxidant power; GC, gas chromatography; IC 50, median inhibitory concentration; MIC, minimum inhibitory concentration; MS, mass spectrometry; RI, retention index/retention indices; RT, retention time.
